properties.description: Creation of the Relevant Representation Curated layer for use by ODT

source: #### If dev or test, limiting the number of output rows and anonymisation of the sensitive fields is required.

from notebookutils import mssparkutils
storage_account=mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account')

is_dev = 'dev' in storage_account
is_test = 'test' in storage_account

# limiting the number of output to 20 rows for dev environment
max_limit = 20 if is_dev else 100000000

spark.sql(f"SET MAX_LIMIT = {max_limit}")
## Setting the max length of the large columns so that ODT can use the data.

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_relevant_representation
AS

SELECT DISTINCT

RR.RelevantRepID                                                       AS representationId,
RR.CaseReference + RR.RelevantRepID                                    AS referenceId,
''                                                                     AS examinationLibraryRef,
RR.CaseReference                                                       AS caseReference,
RR.CaseNodeID                                                          AS caseId,
RR.RelevantRepStatus                                                   AS Status,
SUBSTRING(RR.RepresentationOriginal, 1, ${MAX_LEN})                    AS originalRepresentation1,
SUBSTRING(RR.RepresentationOriginal, ${MAX_LEN}+1, ${MAX_LEN})         AS originalRepresentation2,
SUBSTRING(RR.RepresentationOriginal, (${MAX_LEN}*2)+1, ${MAX_LEN})     AS originalRepresentation3,
SUBSTRING(RR.RepresentationOriginal, (${MAX_LEN}*3)+1, ${MAX_LEN})     AS originalRepresentation4,
CASE 
    WHEN RR.RepresentationRedacted IS NULL
    THEN '0'
    ELSE '1'
END                                                                    AS redacted,
SUBSTRING(RR.RepresentationRedacted, 1, ${MAX_LEN})                    AS redactedRepresentation1,
SUBSTRING(RR.RepresentationRedacted, ${MAX_LEN}+1, ${MAX_LEN})         AS redactedRepresentation2,
SUBSTRING(RR.RepresentationRedacted, (${MAX_LEN}*2)+1, ${MAX_LEN})     AS redactedRepresentation3,
SUBSTRING(RR.RepresentationRedacted, (${MAX_LEN}*3)+1, ${MAX_LEN})     AS redactedRepresentation4,
RR.RedactedBy                                                          AS redactedBy,
SUBSTRING(RR.Notes, 1, ${MAX_LEN})                                     AS redactedNotes1,
SUBSTRING(RR.Notes, ${MAX_LEN}+1, ${MAX_LEN})                          AS redactedNotes2,
SUBSTRING(RR.Notes, (${MAX_LEN}*2)+1, ${MAX_LEN})                      AS redactedNotes3,
SUBSTRING(RR.Notes, (${MAX_LEN}*3)+1, ${MAX_LEN})                      AS redactedNotes4,
RR.RelRepOnBehalfOf                                                    AS representationFrom,
CASE 
    WHEN SU.serviceUserType = 'RepresentationContact'
    THEN RR.ContactID
    ELSE ''
END                                                                    AS representedId,
CASE 
    WHEN SU.serviceUserType = 'Agent'
    THEN RR.ContactID
    ELSE ''
END                                                                    AS representativeId,
RR.RelRepOrganisation                                                  AS representationType,
RR.DateReceived                                                        AS dateReceived,
RR.AttachmentID                                                        AS attachmentIds


FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_relevant_representation_dim       AS RR
JOIN odw_curated_db.nsip_service_user                                  AS SU
    ON SU.ID = RR.ContactID

WHERE RR.ISActive = 'Y'

--RR.CaseReference = 'TR020002'

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE odw_curated_db.relevant_representation
USING delta
AS
SELECT 
    representationId,
    referenceId,
    examinationLibraryRef,
    caseReference,
    caseId,
    Status,
    originalRepresentation1,
    originalRepresentation2,
    originalRepresentation3,
    originalRepresentation4,
    redacted,
    redactedRepresentation1,
    redactedRepresentation2,
    redactedRepresentation3,
    redactedRepresentation4,
    redactedBy,
    redactedNotes1,
    redactedNotes2,
    redactedNotes3,
    redactedNotes4,
    representationFrom,
    representedId,
    representationType,
    dateReceived,
    attachmentIds
    
FROM odw_curated_db.vw_relevant_representation
